trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Dá suporte de tempo de design em um designer visual para o controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.Configure" /> method can be called by the design host.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.Configure" /> pode ser chamado pelo host de design.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.Configure" /> method can be called; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.Configure" /> método pode ser chamado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema(System.Boolean)" /> method can be called by the design host.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema(System.Boolean)" /> pode ser chamado pelo host de design.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema(System.Boolean)" /> method can be called; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema(System.Boolean)" /> método pode ser chamado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.CommandText" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.CommandText" /> do controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" />.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.CommandText" /> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.CommandText" />.

trans-unit.source: Launches the data source configuration utility in the design host.
trans-unit.target: Inicia o utilitário de configuração da fonte de dados no host de design.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.ConnectionString" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.ConnectionString" /> do controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" />.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.ConnectionString" /> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.ConnectionString" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.DefaultContainerName" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.DefaultContainerName" /> do controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" />.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.DefaultContainerName" /> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.DefaultContainerName" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EntitySetName" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EntitySetName" /> do controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" />.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EntitySetName" /> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EntitySetName" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EntityTypeFilter" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EntityTypeFilter" /> do controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" />.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EntityTypeFilter" /> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EntityTypeFilter" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the view to return.
trans-unit.target: O nome da exibição a ser retornada.

trans-unit.source: Returns a data source view that has the specified name.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma exibição da fonte de dados que tem o nome especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Design.EntityDesignerDataSourceView" /> object with the name specified by <paramref name="viewName" />.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Design.EntityDesignerDataSourceView" /> com o nome especificado por <paramref name="viewName" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of available views.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma lista de exibições disponíveis.

trans-unit.source: A collection with one element that contains the name "DefaultView".
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção com um elemento que contém o nome “DefaultView”.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> object to initialize.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> a ser inicializado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the control designer and loads the specified component.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa o designer de controle e carrega o componente especificado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy" /> do controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" />.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy" /> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy" />.

trans-unit.source: The properties to be filtered.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades a serem filtradas.

trans-unit.source: Used by the designer to add properties or remove properties in the properties grid, or to shadow properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Usada pelo designer para remover ou adicionar propriedades na grade de propriedades ou para sombreá-las no controle associado.

trans-unit.source: This member overrides <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Este membro substitui <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to suppress all data source events until the schema is refreshed.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para suprimir todos os eventos de fonte de dados até que o esquema seja atualizado.

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the schema from the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Atualiza o esquema da fonte de dados subjacente.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Select" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Select" /> do controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" />.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Select" /> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Select" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Where" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Where" /> do controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource" />.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Where" /> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Where" />.
